column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh:------ A ministry notice states that Tax on Means of Transportation for 2019 will expire on 30 November 2019. Therefore
column4: all owners of all taxable types of vehicles should promptly submit their vehicle registration and tax forms at the provincial tax branch
column6: ACLEDA Bank or ANZ Royal Bank.------The General Department of Taxation of the Ministry of Economy and Finance will be imposing fines for vehicles that have not paid vehicle tax from January 2020.
